raw_content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding="ISO-8859-1" standalone="no" ?>
<!DOCTYPE WMT_MS_Capabilities SYSTEM "http://schemas.opengis.net/wms/1.1.1/WMS_MS_Capabilities.dtd"
 [
 <!ELEMENT VendorSpecificCapabilities EMPTY>
 ]>  <!-- end of DOCTYPE declaration -->

<WMT_MS_Capabilities version="1.1.1">

<!-- MapServer version 6.4.0 OUTPUT=GIF OUTPUT=PNG OUTPUT=JPEG OUTPUT=KML SUPPORTS=PROJ SUPPORTS=GD SUPPORTS=AGG SUPPORTS=FREETYPE SUPPORTS=CAIRO SUPPORTS=ICONV SUPPORTS=WMS_SERVER SUPPORTS=WMS_CLIENT SUPPORTS=WFS_SERVER SUPPORTS=WCS_SERVER SUPPORTS=GEOS INPUT=JPEG INPUT=POSTGIS INPUT=OGR INPUT=GDAL INPUT=SHAPEFILE -->

<Service>
  <Name>OGC:WMS</Name>
  <Title>National_Geochemical_Survey</Title>
  <OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/"/>
  <ContactInformation>
    <ContactPersonPrimary>
      <ContactPerson>Peter N. Schweitzer</ContactPerson>
      <ContactOrganization>U.S. Geological Survey Mineral Resources Program</ContactOrganization>
    </ContactPersonPrimary>
      <ContactPosition>Geologist</ContactPosition>
    <ContactAddress>
        <AddressType>mailing address</AddressType>
        <Address>Mail Stop 954 USGS National Center</Address>
        <City>Reston</City>
        <StateOrProvince>VA</StateOrProvince>
        <PostCode>20192</PostCode>
        <Country>USA</Country>
    </ContactAddress>
      <ContactVoiceTelephone>703-648-6533</ContactVoiceTelephone>
      <ContactFacsimileTelephone>703-648-6252</ContactFacsimileTelephone>
  <ContactElectronicMailAddress>pschweitzer@usgs.gov</ContactElectronicMailAddress>
  </ContactInformation>
  <Fees>none</Fees>
  <AccessConstraints>none</AccessConstraints>
</Service>

<Capability>
  <Request>
    <GetCapabilities>
      <Format>application/vnd.ogc.wms_xml</Format>
      <DCPType>
        <HTTP>
          <Get><OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?"/></Get>
          <Post><OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?"/></Post>
        </HTTP>
      </DCPType>
    </GetCapabilities>
    <GetMap>
      <Format>image/png</Format>
      <Format>image/jpeg</Format>
      <Format>image/gif</Format>
      <Format>image/png; mode=8bit</Format>
      <Format>application/x-pdf</Format>
      <Format>image/svg+xml</Format>
      <Format>image/tiff</Format>
      <Format>application/vnd.google-earth.kml+xml</Format>
      <Format>application/vnd.google-earth.kmz</Format>
      <DCPType>
        <HTTP>
          <Get><OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?"/></Get>
          <Post><OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?"/></Post>
        </HTTP>
      </DCPType>
    </GetMap>
    <GetFeatureInfo>
      <Format>text/html</Format>
      <Format>application/vnd.ogc.gml</Format>
      <Format>text/plain</Format>
      <DCPType>
        <HTTP>
          <Get><OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?"/></Get>
          <Post><OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?"/></Post>
        </HTTP>
      </DCPType>
    </GetFeatureInfo>
    <DescribeLayer>
      <Format>text/xml</Format>
      <DCPType>
        <HTTP>
          <Get><OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?"/></Get>
          <Post><OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?"/></Post>
        </HTTP>
      </DCPType>
    </DescribeLayer>
    <GetLegendGraphic>
      <Format>image/png</Format>
      <Format>image/jpeg</Format>
      <Format>image/gif</Format>
      <Format>image/png; mode=8bit</Format>
      <DCPType>
        <HTTP>
          <Get><OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?"/></Get>
          <Post><OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?"/></Post>
        </HTTP>
      </DCPType>
    </GetLegendGraphic>
    <GetStyles>
      <Format>text/xml</Format>
      <DCPType>
        <HTTP>
          <Get><OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?"/></Get>
          <Post><OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?"/></Post>
        </HTTP>
      </DCPType>
    </GetStyles>
  </Request>
  <Exception>
    <Format>application/vnd.ogc.se_xml</Format>
    <Format>application/vnd.ogc.se_inimage</Format>
    <Format>application/vnd.ogc.se_blank</Format>
  </Exception>
  <VendorSpecificCapabilities />
  <UserDefinedSymbolization SupportSLD="1" UserLayer="0" UserStyle="1" RemoteWFS="0"/>
  <Layer>
    <Name>National_Geochemical_Survey</Name>
    <Title>National_Geochemical_Survey</Title>
    <Abstract>National_Geochemical_Survey</Abstract>
    <SRS>EPSG:4267</SRS>
    <SRS>EPSG:4269</SRS>
    <SRS>EPSG:4326</SRS>
    <SRS>EPSG:3857</SRS>
    <SRS>EPSG:900913</SRS>
    <SRS>EPSG:102113</SRS>
    <SRS>EPSG:2964</SRS>
    <LatLonBoundingBox minx="-165" miny="24" maxx="-66" maxy="73" />
    <BoundingBox SRS="EPSG:4267"
                minx="-165" miny="24" maxx="-66" maxy="73" />
    <Layer>
      <Name>natgeochem</Name>
      <Title>natgeochem</Title>
      <Abstract>natgeochem</Abstract>
    <Style>
       <Name>default</Name>
       <Title>default</Title>
       <LegendURL width="203" height="21">
          <Format>image/png</Format>
          <OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?version=1.1.1&service=WMS&request=GetLegendGraphic&layer=natgeochem&format=image/png&STYLE=default"/>
       </LegendURL>
    </Style>
      <Layer queryable="1" opaque="0" cascaded="0">
        <Name>natgeochem-high</Name>
        <Title>natgeochem</Title>
        <Abstract>USGS Web Mapping Service:  National Geochemical Survey</Abstract>
        <KeywordList>
            <Keyword>geochemistry</Keyword>
            <Keyword> unconsolidated deposits</Keyword>
        </KeywordList>
        <SRS>EPSG:4267</SRS>
        <SRS>EPSG:4269</SRS>
        <SRS>EPSG:4326</SRS>
        <SRS>EPSG:3857</SRS>
        <SRS>EPSG:900913</SRS>
        <SRS>EPSG:102113</SRS>
        <SRS>EPSG:2964</SRS>
        <LatLonBoundingBox minx="-179" miny="6" maxx="159" maxy="72" />
        <BoundingBox SRS="EPSG:4267"
                    minx="-179" miny="6" maxx="159" maxy="72" />
    <Attribution>
        <Title>National Geochemical Survey database</Title>
        <OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/geochem/"/>
    </Attribution>
        <MetadataURL type="FGDC">
          <Format>text/xml</Format>
          <OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/metadata/ofr-2004-1001.xml"/>
        </MetadataURL>
        <Style>
          <Name>default</Name>
          <Title>default</Title>
          <LegendURL width="203" height="21">
             <Format>image/png</Format>
             <OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/services/ngs?version=1.1.1&service=WMS&request=GetLegendGraphic&layer=natgeochem-high&format=image/png&STYLE=default"/>
          </LegendURL>
        </Style>
        <ScaleHint min="0" max="2494.51424214819" />
      </Layer>
      <Layer queryable="1" opaque="0" cascaded="0">
        <Name>natgeochem-low</Name>
        <Title>natgeochem</Title>
        <Abstract>USGS Web Mapping Service:  National Geochemical Survey</Abstract>
        <KeywordList>
            <Keyword>geochemistry</Keyword>
            <Keyword> unconsolidated deposits</Keyword>
        </KeywordList>
        <SRS>EPSG:4267</SRS>
        <SRS>EPSG:4269</SRS>
        <SRS>EPSG:4326</SRS>
        <SRS>EPSG:3857</SRS>
        <SRS>EPSG:900913</SRS>
        <SRS>EPSG:102113</SRS>
        <SRS>EPSG:2964</SRS>
        <LatLonBoundingBox minx="-179" miny="6" maxx="159" maxy="72" />
        <BoundingBox SRS="EPSG:4267"
                    minx="-179" miny="6" maxx="159" maxy="72" />
    <Attribution>
        <Title>National Geochemical Survey database</Title>
        <OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/geochem/"/>
    </Attribution>
        <MetadataURL type="FGDC">
          <Format>text/xml</Format>
          <OnlineResource xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="http://mrdata.usgs.gov/metadata/ofr-2004-1001.xml"/>
        </MetadataURL>
        <ScaleHint min="2494.51424214819" max="0" />
        <!-- WARNING: Only MINSCALEDENOM and no MAXSCALEDENOM specified in the mapfile. A default value of 0 has been returned for the Max ScaleHint but this is probably not what you want. -->
      </Layer>
    </Layer>
  </Layer>
</Capability>
</WMT_MS_Capabilities>
content: OGC:WMS National_Geochemical_Survey Peter N. Schweitzer U.S. Geological Survey Mineral Resources Program Geologist mailing address Mail Stop 954 USGS National Center Reston VA 20192 USA 703-648-6533 703-648-6252 pschweitzer@usgs.gov none none application/vnd.ogc.wms_xml image/png image/jpeg image/gif image/png; mode=8bit application/x-pdf image/svg+xml image/tiff application/vnd.google-earth.kml+xml application/vnd.google-earth.kmz text/html application/vnd.ogc.gml text/plain text/xml image/png image/jpeg image/gif image/png; mode=8bit text/xml application/vnd.ogc.se_xml application/vnd.ogc.se_inimage application/vnd.ogc.se_blank National_Geochemical_Survey National_Geochemical_Survey National_Geochemical_Survey EPSG:4267 EPSG:4269 EPSG:4326 EPSG:3857 EPSG:900913 EPSG:102113 EPSG:2964 natgeochem natgeochem natgeochem default default image/png natgeochem-high natgeochem USGS Web Mapping Service: National Geochemical Survey geochemistry unconsolidated deposits EPSG:4267 EPSG:4269 EPSG:4326 EPSG:3857 EPSG:900913 EPSG:102113 EPSG:2964 National Geochemical Survey database text/xml default default image/png natgeochem-low natgeochem USGS Web Mapping Service: National Geochemical Survey geochemistry unconsolidated deposits EPSG:4267 EPSG:4269 EPSG:4326 EPSG:3857 EPSG:900913 EPSG:102113 EPSG:2964 National Geochemical Survey database text/xml
